entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Port Colborne
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 10:11 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:11 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 12.
